data.text: Postponed! Power is out in my neighborhood, which means no WiFi, and phone service here would put us all in a silent Chaplin movie.  We’ll reschedule when the lights come on again, and keep you posted! https://t.co/VlIlm3kALW

Join me for a talk w/ one of the smartest and most altruistic men I know: Dr. Larry Brilliant, whose name fits him like a glove. With all the misinformation surrounding the pandemic, one of America’s most celebrated epidemiologists will help us get down to the science of it all. https://t.co/DERlF1YNgm
Oh my God. .@realDonaldTrump Please for the sake of our Nation please drop these arguments without evidence or factual basis. #stopthestupid https://t.co/IMMImXrckV

To the doctors, nurses, lab techs, hospital janitorial staff, etc. still bravely fighting this pandemic, we feel for you as we watch a nation take your selfless dedication for granted. Your frustration must be endless, but your heroism is appreciated.  https://t.co/fmOYAtet8k
Man Getting High And Eating Taco Bell Thousands Of Miles Away From Family Having Best Thanksgiving Of Life https://t.co/bE5EHnI6Z7 https://t.co/53FZHfky9P

To be clear: This president abdicated a federal leadership role in the battle against the pandemic, and left it in the laps of the states. Then, when a state attempted to govern, the president’s justices blocked it. This is why this health crisis persists.
https://t.co/4PLWzPwmUn

Gorsuch, if you can’t make the distinction between the risk level of a small business like a liquor store and massive indoor gathering like a church with regard to a raging pandemic, you are more scientifically illiterate than the man who appointed you.
https://t.co/M5VRT1xL8N

Today Trump could have urged Americans to behave responsibly in light of the pandemic. He could have asked Congress to move on a COVID package. He could have made sure the government was helping with testing and PPE. Instead he pardoned Flynn and claimed the election was rigged.

Our knowledge of how the virus spreads is much more extensive than it was in March. We know how to maintain relative protection through the use of masks and avoidance of groups. Vaccines are right around the corner. All this is temporary. Stop being reckless and start being safe. https://t.co/2RupoFaMgD

A COVID ICU patient in Texas told a nurse the virus is “fake news.” A Calif. nurse was mocked for wearing a mask. As a new wave of COVID sweeps the country, health care workers are grappling with the consequences of the president’s misinformation machine. 
https://t.co/0BvgMeTeWm
Apologies to Lukas Gage https://t.co/yIq1wh4Ysm

I was not ready for the emotional gravitas of "Deflectors" (season 2, episode 7). #TheOrville continues to surprise and awe me in the best ways. @SethMacFarlane, @DavidAGoodman, and Andre Bormanis: thank you for this story. It means more than you know. https://t.co/l8JIasmZQM

@SethMacFarlane Science is life. They say the world is ruled by money, no the world is ruled by chemistry and biology. ❤️

With both Moderna and Pfizer announcing the successful development of a vaccine that appears to be over 90% effective, take a minute to appreciate how fucking amazing that is.  A group of scientists will have beaten a novel disease less than a year after its outbreak. Go science.

‘No One Is Listening to Us’

During this pandemic, you might be inspired by the heroic efforts of a man who was instrumental in the eradication of an even deadlier one—smallpox. Dr. Larry Brilliant’s work with the WHO effectively helped to wipe this disease off the face of the globe. Great read! https://t.co/1Z3qwkY7aP

Now that the campaign is over—what is the people’s will? What is our mandate?

I believe it is this: Americans have called on us to marshal the forces of decency and the forces of fairness. To marshal the forces of science and the forces of hope in the great battles of our time.

Great read.  Yes, it’s about a pandemic, but more accurately, it’s a love letter to the heroes of medical science.  Also very reminiscent of Michael Crichton as his best. https://t.co/iEG9mx7C8x

Dear Science Deniers,

(Anti-vaxers, anti-maskers, climate hoaxers, flat-Earthers, etc)

You found one another & communicate via stupefyingly advanced technologies that pivot on the discoveries of scientists.

Just thought I’d remind you of that fact.

Sincerely,
Your Smart Phone

Can’t think of a better way to draw attention to this terrific book by Jaron Lanier than with a clean slate. Can we learn to use social media with discipline and selectivity? Or will it inevitably get the better of us? I don’t know. But let’s try this again from the top. https://t.co/Du3fxqE4aG
